title: Composition Writing (作文写作)
description: Master narrative essay writing, descriptive techniques, and composition structure
description_zh: 掌握记叙文写作、描写技巧和作文结构

sections.title: Narrative Essays
sections.content: Narrative essays tell a story with beginning, middle, and end. Include characters, setting, plot.
sections.content_zh: 记叙文讲述一个有开头、中间和结尾的故事。包括人物、环境、情节。

sections.title: 5W1H Method
sections.content: Who, What, When, Where, Why, How - answer these questions in your writing.
sections.content_zh: 谁、什么、何时、何地、为什么、如何 - 在写作中回答这些问题。

sections.title: Descriptive Techniques
sections.content: Use 外貌描写 (appearance), 动作描写 (actions), 心理描写 (thoughts), 语言描写 (dialogue).
sections.content_zh: 使用外貌描写、动作描写、心理描写、语言描写。

exercises.question: What does 5W1H stand for?
choices: Who, What, When, Where, Why, How
choices_zh: 谁、什么、何时、何地、为什么、如何
exercises.explanation: The 6 key questions to answer in narrative writing
exercises.explanation_zh: 记叙文中要回答的6个关键问题
